value.fullName: High - Closest friends and supporters; Year Up is their top philanthropy
value.label: High - Closest friends and supporters; Year Up is their top philanthropy

value.fullName: Medium High - Donors giving near capacity with enthusiasm, but not their top philanthropy
value.label: Medium High - Donors giving near capacity with enthusiasm, but not their top philanthropy

value.fullName: Medium - Donors but not giving at significant levels; requires significant cultivation
value.label: Medium - Donors but not giving at significant levels; requires significant cultivation

value.fullName: Low - Little Development contact; or displayed minimal interest
value.label: Low - Little Development contact; or displayed minimal interest

value.fullName: Unknown - Unqualified; requires research analysis and/or a Development Officer contact
value.label: Unknown - Unqualified; requires research analysis and/or a Development Officer contact
